name: Machete
description:
Leenox, Molesto, Danielle and Roméo, four brothers and sisters, are peacefully living on Grozg Island with their lovely, giant rabbit-like creatures: the Machetes.

One night, as they're innocently sleeping, something strange come to the island and steal Machetes' eyes...

Literally, eyeless Machetes!

One of the siblings will have to venture to the only place someone or something this malicious could be;

TEH CAVE!
  • Awesome jetpack traveling action with carrot shooting!
  • Choose from four different characters
  • Explore the depths of TEH CAVE, featuring bizarre creatures and creative maps
  • Filled with secrets and collectibles
  • Voice-made SFX!
  • Classical 16bit style soundtrack
